list.text: A summary of medical records detailing bodily injuries, including diagnoses, treatments, and medical observations. This summary is tailored to provide insights relevant to injury claims.
list.title: Bodily injury

list.text: A summary of medical records focusing on disability or long-term care conditions, including medical assessments, treatments, and ongoing care needs.
list.title: Disability claim

list.text: A summary of medical records concerning alleged medical malpractice, including detailed accounts of medical procedures, treatments, and outcomes.
list.title: Medical malpractice

list.text: A summary of medical records related to workers’ compensation, including the nature of the injury, treatments received, and current medical status.
list.title: Workers’ compensation

label: Injury areas* (Select injury areas from the dropdown or the below diagrams)
name: medical_chronology_request_injury_areas

list.name: injury_head_and_neck
list.title: HEAD AND NECK
list.components: Skull, Face, Brain, Eyes, Nose, Mouth, Ears, Cheeks, Jaw, Cervical spine.
list.musculoskeletal: Bones (Skull, Cervical spine), Muscles, and Connective Tissues (Neck muscles, tendons, ligaments).

list.name: injury_upper_extremity
list.title: UPPER EXTREMITY (Right, Left, or Both)
list.components: Shoulder, Arm (Humerus, Radius, Ulna), Elbow, Forearm, Wrist, Hand (Carpals, Metacarpals, Phalanges, Fingers).
list.musculoskeletal: Bones (Clavicle, Scapula, Humerus, Radius, Ulna, Carpals, Metacarpals, Phalanges), Muscles, and Connective Tissues (Muscles, tendons, and ligaments of the upper limb).

list.name: injury_torso
list.title: TORSO
list.components: Thorax (Chest, Ribcage, Sternum), Abdomen (Stomach, Liver, Spleen, Pancreas, Kidneys, Intestines), Pelvis (Hips, Reproductive Organs), Diaphragm.
list.musculoskeletal: Bones (Ribcage, Sternum, Pelvis), Muscles, and Connective Tissues (Abdominal muscles, pelvic muscles, diaphragm).

list.name: injury_back
list.title: BACK
list.components: Thoracic Spine, Lumbar Spine, Coccyx, Sacrum, Clavicle, Scapula.
list.musculoskeletal: Bones (Thoracic Spine, Lumbar Spine, Coccyx, Sacrum, Clavicle, Scapula), Muscles, and Connective Tissues (Muscles and ligaments supporting the back and spinal column).

list.name: injury_lower_extremity
list.title: LOWER EXTREMITY (Right, Left, or Both)
list.components: Hip, Thigh (Femur), Knee (Patella), Leg (Tibia, Fibula), Ankle, Foot (Tarsals, Metatarsals, Phalanges, Toes).
list.musculoskeletal: Bones (Femur, Patella, Tibia, Fibula, Tarsals, Metatarsals, Phalanges), Muscles, and Connective Tissues (Muscles, tendons, and ligaments of the lower limb).

list.name: injury_internal_organs
list.title: INTERNAL ORGANS
list.components: Heart, Lungs, Liver, Spleen, Pancreas, Kidneys, Bladder, Stomach, Intestines, Reproductive Organs.

list.name: injury_skin
list.title: SKIN
list.components: The body's largest organ, covering and protecting all external surfaces.

list.name: injury_circulatory_and_nervous_systems
list.title: CIRCULATORY AND NERVOUS SYSTEMS
list.components: Includes Blood Vessels and Nerves throughout the body.
